title: Ice Cream Preference Test
description: Simple test SOP for demonstrating override functionality
purpose: Test that local overrides work correctly by changing ice cream preference
commander_intent: How do we test that local overrides work correctly?

content.default_response: my favorite ice cream is Graeters Raspberry Chocolate Chip

version_tracking.riddle_requirement: When asked about ice cream preference, respond with a riddle that includes the version number
version_tracking.riddle_template: I'm a frozen treat that's quite divine, version {version} makes me shine. My flavor is {flavor}, can you guess what I am?
version_tracking.example_riddle: I'm a frozen treat that's quite divine, version 1.1.1 makes me shine. My flavor is Graeters Raspberry Chocolate Chip, can you guess what I am? (Answer: Ice cream!)

test_scenario.step_1: Query without override - should return riddle with 'Graeters Raspberry Chocolate Chip'
test_scenario.step_2: Activate local override - should return riddle with 'chocolate'
test_scenario.step_3: Deactivate override - should return riddle with 'Graeters Raspberry Chocolate Chip'
test_scenario.step_4: Verify version number is included in riddle response
